description: Create, update, restart and delete networks.

domain.description: Domain the network is related to.

end_ipv6.description: The ending IPv6 address of the network belongs to.

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

zone.description: Name of the zone in which the network should be deployed.

start_ipv6.description: The beginning IPv6 address of the network belongs to.

cidr_ipv6.description: CIDR of IPv6 network, must be at least /64.

end_ip.description: The ending IPv4 address of the network belongs to.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

vlan.description: The ID or VID of the network.

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

network_offering.description: Name of the offering for the network.

vpc.description: Name of the VPC of the network.

start_ip.description: The beginning IPv4 address of the network belongs to.

gateway_ipv6.description: The gateway of the IPv6 network.

isolated_pvlan.description: The isolated private VLAN for this network.

account.description: Account the network is related to.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the network to be deployed in.
